GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

POST /api/topics.description: Posts new topic, serving the new topic back

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of articles paginated (use p to navigate pages, and limit for entries per page), including the vote count and comment count.

POST /api/articles.description: posts a new article, serving the posted article

example post.author: butter_bridge
example post.title: I love cats!
example post.body: I just think they're really neat

newArticle.author: butter_bridge
newArticle.title: I love cats!
newArticle.body: I just think they're really neat

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users including the username, name and avatar_url

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object corresponding with the given username

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing the article with the corresponding id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes of the article with the corresponding id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object containing the comments related to the given article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to the comment table, serving the posted comment

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the votes of the comment with the corresponding id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment with the associated id given and responds with the status code only
